News.Title: Hindprakash Industries Reports 41% Decline in Quarterly Net Profit to Rs 13.92 Lakhs
News.Summary: Hindprakash Industries Limited reported net profit of Rs 13.92 lakhs for the quarter ended September 30, 2025, down from Rs 65.86 lakhs in the same quarter last year, despite revenue increasing to Rs 3,133.18 lakhs from Rs 2,029.18 lakhs. The company's half-year net profit also declined to Rs 23.70 lakhs compared to Rs 92.22 lakhs in the previous year, reflecting margin pressures despite higher sales volumes.

News.Title: Hindprakash Industries Reports 63% Drop in Net Profit for June 2025 Quarter
News.Summary: Hindprakash Industries Limited reported a net profit of Rs 9.78 lakhs for the quarter ended June 30, 2025, compared to Rs 26.36 lakhs in the same quarter last year, representing a 63% decline. Revenue from operations increased to Rs 3,015.44 lakhs from Rs 2,248.10 lakhs year-over-year, showing 34% growth. Total income rose to Rs 3,087.83 lakhs versus Rs 2,284.87 lakhs in the previous year. The company's earnings per share decreased to Rs 0.09 from Rs 0.23 in the corresponding quarter. Employee benefit expenses increased significantly to Rs 137.69 lakhs from Rs 64.25 lakhs, while finance costs rose to Rs 99.80 lakhs from Rs 62.72 lakhs. The Board of Directors approved these unaudited standalone financial results in a meeting held on August 14, 2025.
